title: Man arrested after child grazed by bullet in Price Hill
content:
PRICE HILL (FOX19) -
A 26-year old man was arrested after a child was stuck by a bullet early Saturday morning in Price Hill.
Police said the child was grazed in the back when Rodney Williams said he accidentally discharged the gun while he was cleaning it.
Williams was charged with negligent assault after the incident on Guerley Road.
Bond was set at $25,000.
Child protective services was notified after the incident.
